about_the_game:
Play as Stack – a tower of buddies just trying to take a nap – when mysterious grumbles start falling from the sky! Dodge them, weave them, and swerve to grab some coins. Develop a healthy addiction to coins as you find the source of your sleeping debacle… from above. Maybe grab a friend (or seven) along the way.

There are many ways to play, the game supports WASD, arrow keys, controller, mouse and touchscreen. There’s also a range of options to tweak so that the game can run more smoothly on different devices.

Players without fast reaction time can also benefit from the assist modes, that allow you to play the regular game, but without any finicky button inputs.

You can also play with between 2 and 7 other players for local co-op or party modes.

Play through eight different levels as you find the source of these mysterious falling grumbles. Each level has a unique gimmick which will change up how you must approach it. 

Play with a buddy and work through the story mode together or play locally with up to seven friends to battle it out for a victor! There are 7 unique powerups to fight with.

Got a spare minute? Rounds are fast and can be played for short periods. And between the achievements, coin goals and high scores, you’ll be kept busy!

Change settings in MENU>OPTIONS, including audio, visual, system and accessibility options. There are also Settings Presets to quickly make adjustments.

Program and modify the game with Datapackles. Perform commands in the in-game console, and create Datapackles which have functionality for custom levels, and other shenanigans. See the documentation to learn more.

Updates to STACK & the Gumblepuff from Above. See MENU>INFO in-game for a complete summary.

name: STACK & the Grumblepuff from Above

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel-enabled Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Stack just wanted to take a nap – when grumbles start falling from the sky! … Dodge them, weave them, and swerve to grab some coins as you find the source of your sleeping debacle.
